Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.jgoodies.forms.factories.Borders
    Replaced by Paddings.
    com.jgoodies.forms.builder.DefaultFormBuilder
    Replaced by the FormBuilder and the internationalization support provided by the JGoodies Smart Client Resources class. Although deprecated, this class will remain in the Forms library for the next versions.
    com.jgoodies.forms.builder.I15dPanelBuilder
    Replaced by the internationalization support provided by the JGoodies Smart Client Resources class. Although deprecated, this class will remain in the Forms library for the next versions.
    com.jgoodies.forms.builder.PanelBuilder
    Replaced by FormBuilder. However, this class will remain in the Forms library for the next versions.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.jgoodies.forms.builder.FormBuilder.border(String)
    Use FormBuilder.padding(String, Object...) instead
    com.jgoodies.forms.internal.AbstractBuilder.border(String)
    Replaced by AbstractBuilder.padding(String, Object...)
    com.jgoodies.forms.factories.Forms.border(String, JComponent)
    Use Forms.padding(JComponent,String, Object...) instead
    com.jgoodies.forms.factories.Borders.createEmptyBorder(ConstantSize, ConstantSize, ConstantSize, ConstantSize)
    Replaced by Paddings.createPadding(ConstantSize, ConstantSize, ConstantSize, ConstantSize).
    com.jgoodies.forms.factories.Borders.createEmptyBorder(String)
    Replaced by Paddings.createPadding(String, Object...).
    com.jgoodies.forms.internal.AbstractBuilder.getContainer()
    Replaced by AbstractBuilder.getPanel()
    com.jgoodies.forms.internal.AbstractButtonPanelBuilder.setBackground(Color)
    Replaced by AbstractBuilder.background(Color)
    com.jgoodies.forms.internal.AbstractButtonPanelBuilder.setBorder(Border)
    Replaced by AbstractBuilder.border(Border)
    com.jgoodies.forms.internal.AbstractButtonPanelBuilder.setOpaque(boolean)
    Replaced by AbstractBuilder.opaque(boolean)
